name: mussy
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
untidy: mussy hair When she returned from her run, her short, mussy hair was plastered to her forehead. His hair was mussy and looked as if he hadn't combed it before he left. The garden was mussy, with piles of wood and old machinery everywhere.
More examplesFewer examplesTry to get rid of any mussy edges on the photos.She brushed a strand of mussy hair off her face.His hair was mussy and stood up on top of his head.His cheap, cotton shirt was dirty and mussy.
